Introducing "Timezone Converter" — a sleek and intuitive Chrome extension designed to simplify your international scheduling needs. Whether you’re coordinating meetings across continents or planning a call with friends overseas, our extension offers an effortless way to convert time zones right from your browser.

Key Features:
- Automatic Detection: The extension automatically fetches your local date and time, setting them as the default for quick conversions.
- Comprehensive City List: Choose from an extensive list of major global cities sorted alphabetically, including cities across North America, Europe, Asia, Australia, and Africa. Each city is associated with its respective timezone, ensuring accurate conversions.
- Flexible Input: Easily adjust the date and time inputs if you need to plan ahead for future events or travel.
- Detailed Output: Not only do you get the converted time, but the extension also displays the difference in hours and days between your current location and the selected destination, providing a clear understanding of time discrepancies.

Our user-friendly interface ensures that all functionalities are just a click away, integrated seamlessly into your Chrome browser. Perfect for professionals, travelers, and anyone needing to navigate the complexities of global time zones.

Get the "Timezone Converter" today and take the guesswork out of your international interactions, making time zone conversion as easy as a single click!
